Text: Updage on GBUCsXchange and an interesting million dollar articleall We continue to make progress on the EPP electronic payment platform and are we are actually testing some modules internally The market continues to migrate toward our space which hopefully means there will be a greater understanding of what our system can do The existing trillion dollar market is possibly bigger than we thought We are having conversations with several Fortune companies who do noncash trading in an effort to ascertain the size of each of their current markets We are heavily involved in our current raise of MM While we are in discussions with a few organizations we would be interested in speaking with anyone who has an interest in a large market experienced management team closed loop settlement platform and a company with HIDDEN VALUE So if you are aware of either angels with or more to invest or seed or startup VCs who can bring Million to the table let us know In todays market it is often difficult to determine true value in a corporation much less the hidden value This hidden value is often called IP or Intellectual Property On that front the good news for us is We own our Intellectual Property Why is this important you may ask Well a business associate of mine at a company called Neo Media NEOM just recently signed a MILLION DOLLAR PLUS licensing agreement for their suite of patents This is extremely encouraging as the market NEOM is in is dwarfed in comparison to the global trade market where our IP is based We have been very diligent in filing the IP documents and the attorneys have issued a letter of opinion stating the validity and defensibility of our claims This should prove extremely valuable as we move forward in building the company As other competitors attempt to move into our space they will bump up against the our patents This will pose tremendous licensing opportunities for GBUCs and Xchange A very interesting point within the NEOM agreement is the NONEXCLUSIVE nature of the license Congratulations to all at NEOM and thank you for paving the way for corporations like ours If any of you are interested in reading the entire article it can be found at the following link neomediaprocthtm If you have any input or questions feel free to contact me directly Thank all of you for your help and support so far Thanking you in advance sincerely Stephen Meade CEOCRO Chief Relationship Officer GBUCS LLC Stephen BUCScom Direct Direct Fax wwwGBUCScom Web Services Managing Director wwwSiteVisionscom East Wacker Place Suite Chicago IL
